WarlordEmblem:BadgeBless.NAME: Blessing Badge
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yStrength, #yDexterity and #yFouce At the start of combat.

WarlordEmblem:BadgeWrath.NAME: Badge of Wrath
WarlordEmblem:BadgeWrath.FLAVOR: Badges rarely get angry. But when he get angry, the consequences are serious.
DESCRIPTIONS: All enemies lose #b1 #yStrength at the beginning of combat. NL #bSynergy-Badge Bless: Apply #b1 #yWeak to all enemy at the beginning of combat.

WarlordEmblem:EvilBlood.NAME: Evil Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b4 HP at the start of combat. Heal #b9 HP on victory. NL #bSynergy-Burning Blood/Black Blood: You don't lose health at the start of combat from this relic.

WarlordEmblem:HatTrick.NAME: Hat Trick
WarlordEmblem:HatTrick.FLAVOR: Your amazing skills ensure the dealer can't help but admire you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 #ySkills in a single turn, draw #b1 card.

WarlordEmblem:HeavyShield.NAME: Heavy Shield
WarlordEmblem:HeavyShield.FLAVOR: Powerful defense will make you lose your mobility.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #yBarricade and lose #r1 #yDexterity at the start of combat. NL Synergy- #yCalipers: You don't lose that #yDexterity.

WarlordEmblem:OldTorch.NAME: Old Torch
WarlordEmblem:OldTorch.FLAVOR: The torch is old and sputters faintly, casting a dim light.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 energy on the second turn of combat. NL #bSynergy-Lantern: Gain an extra energy at the beginning of combat.

WarlordEmblem:Pill.NAME: DEPRECATED Pill
WarlordEmblem:Pill.FLAVOR: It will make you stronger and more vulnerable.(“茶雨微凉”)
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 #yStrength and lost #r2 #yDexterity at the start of each combat.  NL NL #bSynergy-Medical Kit: You wont lost #YDexterity by this relic.

WarlordEmblem:SaveLoadDisk.NAME: Save Load Disk
WarlordEmblem:SaveLoadDisk.FLAVOR: Nothing is more suitable for save / load.
DESCRIPTIONS: Set you HP to 50% of your max health at the start of combat.

WarlordEmblem:SmileMask.NAME: Smile Mask
WarlordEmblem:SmileMask.FLAVOR: The shopkeeper slips you an extra card from time to time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 3 turns, draw #b1 card. NL #bSynergy-Happy Flower: Draw #b1 extra card.

WarlordEmblem:SoftArmor.NAME: Soft Armor
WarlordEmblem:SoftArmor.FLAVOR: This is because we can't find a better picture.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 #yPlated Armor and #yThorns at the start of combat.

WarlordEmblem:VoidPower.NAME: Void Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Shuffle #r3 #yVoid into your discard pile at the start of combat.

WarlordEmblem:BrokenMantle.NAME: Broken Mantle
WarlordEmblem:BrokenMantle.FLAVOR: When you put on this mantle, you become much lighter.(“prttt”)
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have less than 50% of your health at the start of combat, gain #b3 #yDexterity.  NL NL #bSynergy- #yCloak #yClasp: #b4 #yDexterity.

WarlordEmblem:Scar.NAME: Scar
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] and lose 1 HP at the start of your turn.

WarlordEmblem:BrokenWatch.NAME: Broken Watch
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 12 cards, gain #b1 #yStrength.Shuffle 1 #rSlimed into your discard pile.

WarlordEmblem:BurningIcecream.NAME: DEPRECATED Burning Ice cream
WarlordEmblem:BurningIcecream.FLAVOR: Many people can't hold the ice cream at all.(“夜影丿殇”)
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始，增加 #b1 点 #y力量 . NL 回合结束时， #r失去所有力量 ，对所有敌人造成等额的伤害.

WarlordEmblem:RuneSword.NAME: Rune Sword
WarlordEmblem:RuneSword.FLAVOR: A Weapon full of mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Energy charged in your Rune Sword, to a maximum of 6. Gain 2 rune energy at the start of your turn.

WarlordEmblem:BloodRealm.NAME: Blood Specialization
DESCRIPTIONS: Improves Blood cards.

WarlordEmblem:IceRealm.NAME: Ice Specialization
DESCRIPTIONS: Improves Ice cards.

WarlordEmblem:EvilRealm.NAME: Evil Specialization
DESCRIPTIONS: Improves Evil cards.

WarlordEmblem:DKHelm.NAME: Death Knight Helm
WarlordEmblem:DKHelm.FLAVOR: The helmet of an unmatched Death Knight.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you have either 6 or 0 Rune Energy, you are considered to have Blood, Ice, and Evil specializations.

WarlordEmblem:Clown.NAME: Clown
WarlordEmblem:Clown.FLAVOR: An acrobatic clown, living an ignoble existence.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you play a different card type in a turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies.

WarlordEmblem:WuziBook.NAME: Wuzi Book
WarlordEmblem:WuziBook.FLAVOR: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #ySkills during your turn, NL heal 2 HP at the end of your turn. (Maximum 8). NL #bSynergy-Art of War: Gain #b1 Artifact at the start of combat.

WarlordEmblem:BadgeProtect.NAME: Badge of Protection
WarlordEmblem:BadgeProtect.FLAVOR: Don't let your enemies ravage you mercilessly.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn without #yBlock, apply #b1 #yWeak to all enemy.

WarlordEmblem:KitchenKnife.NAME: Kitchen Knife
WarlordEmblem:KitchenKnife.FLAVOR: Even a martial artist fears a knife.
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal 2 HP when you kill a non-minion enemy. (Maximum 8)

WarlordEmblem:BadgeMouse.NAME: Badge of the Mouse
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] next turn if you end of your turn in #b4 second. NL Gain [E] if in #b8 second.

WarlordEmblem:BreastProtector.NAME: Breastplate
WarlordEmblem:BreastProtector.FLAVOR: A guard against knives in the dark.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, increase your max HP by #b28.

WarlordEmblem:GoldMime.NAME: Gold Mime
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain gold equal to damage taken when attacked.

WarlordEmblem:BadgeIronclad.NAME: Badge of The Ironclad
DESCRIPTIONS: You can gain #rRed #rCards.

WarlordEmblem:BadgeTheSilent.NAME: Badge of The Silent
DESCRIPTIONS: You can gain #gGreen #rCards.

WarlordEmblem:BadgeDefect.NAME: Badge of The Defect
DESCRIPTIONS: You can gain #bBlue #rCards.

WarlordEmblem:QuestMage.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Mage.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yOpen #ythe #yWaygate to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yPlay #y6 #yColorless #ycards. NL Reward: #yTime Warp.

WarlordEmblem:QuestHunter.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Hunter.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yThe #yMarsh #yQueen to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yPlay 7 0-cost cards. NL Reward: #yQueen #yCamassa.

WarlordEmblem:QuestWarrior.NAME: Warrior's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestWarrior.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Warrior.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yFire #yPlume's #yHeart to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yGain Block 7 times. NL Reward: #ySulfuras.

WarlordEmblem:QuestDruid.NAME: Druid's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestDruid.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Druid.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yJungle #yGiants to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yPlay 5 cards has 2 or more cost. NL Reward: #yBamabus.

WarlordEmblem:QuestPaladin.NAME: Paladin's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestPaladin.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Paladin.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yThe #yLast #yKaeidosaur to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yGain 6 buff or debuff.  NL Reward: #yGalvadon.

WarlordEmblem:QuestPriest.NAME: Priest's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestPriest.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Priest.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yAwaken #ythe #yMakers to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yExhaust 7 cards. NL Reward: #yAmara,Warden of Hope.

WarlordEmblem:QuestWarlock.NAME: Warlock's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestWarlock.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Warlock.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yLakkari #ySacrifice to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yDiscard 6 cards. NL Reward: #yNether Portal.

WarlordEmblem:QuestRogue.NAME: Rogue's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestRogue.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Rogue.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yThe #yCaverns #yBelow to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yPlay 5 same cards. NL Reward: #yCrystal Core.

WarlordEmblem:QuestShaman.NAME: Shaman's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestShaman.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Shaman.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yUnite #ythe #yMurlocs to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest: #yPlay 10 Skills. NL Reward: #yMegafin.

WarlordEmblem:QuestDK.NAME: Death Knight's Quest Ring
WarlordEmblem:QuestDK.FLAVOR: A ring containing the power of an elite Death Knight.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yPower #yof #yDark to your hand at the start of combat. NL Quest:Draw 5 Curse or Status cards. NL Reward: NL #yFrostmourne.

WarlordEmblem:MantleReynold.NAME: Reynold's Mantle
WarlordEmblem:MantleReynold.FLAVOR: A cloak full of mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Shuffle a #yReynold to your draw pile at the start of combat. NL If all your cards in your draw pile is different.Heal your health at the start of this combat.(at most 20).

WarlordEmblem:MantleLazz.FLAVOR: A cloak full of mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Shuffle a #yLazz to your draw pile at the start of combat. NL If all your cards in your draw pile is different.  NL Gain [E] [E] each turn in this combat.

WarlordEmblem:MantleKazakus.FLAVOR: A cloak full of mysterious power.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle,gain #b4 #yMaxRune.

WarlordEmblem:ProtectBox.NAME: Protect Box
